ers affect around 15 percent of older adults in a given year. More women than men experience anxiety disorders. They tend to be less common among older adults than younger adults. But developing an anxiety disorder late in life is not a normal part of aging.,NIHSeniorHealth,Anxiety Disorders
What is (are) Anxiety Disorders ?,"Anxiety disorders are a collection of disorders that include generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), social phobia, and panic disorder.",NIHSeniorHealth,Anxiety Disorders
